scripts.tool:eslint:check: npm run tool:eslint:uninstall && npm run tool:eslint:install && npm run tool:lint
scripts.tool:eslint:hereis: npm run tool:w -- eslint || npm run tool:eslint:install
scripts.tool:eslint:packages: cross-env-shell "TNI_PACKAGES=@babel/core @babel/eslint-parser @babel/plugin-syntax-top-level-await eslint eslint-config-prettier eslint-config-standard eslint-plugin-html eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-md eslint-plugin-node eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-promise eslint-plugin-svelte3 prettier prettier-plugin-svelte" "npm run --"
scripts.tool:format:command: npm run tool:format:code && npm run tool:format:package
scripts.tool:format:commit: npm run tool:format && npm run tool:git:commit:format
scripts.tool:format:static: npm run tool:hereis:node-minify && npm run tool:format:static:js && npm run tool:format:static:html
scripts.tool:format:static:html: cross-env-shell "TSE_CMD=find src/static/ -type f -name \*.htm\* -exec echo {} \; -exec npx --no-install node-minify --compressor html-minifier --input {} --output {}.min \; -exec rm {} \; -exec mv {}.min {} \;" "npm run tool:shell:exec"
scripts.tool:format:static:js: cross-env-shell "TSE_CMD=find src/static/ -type f -name \*.js -exec echo {} \; -exec npx --no-install node-minify --compressor uglify-es --input {} --output {}.min \; -exec rm {} \; -exec mv {}.min {} \;" "npm run tool:shell:exec"
scripts.tool:lint: npm run tool:eslint:hereis && echo "start Formatting" && prettier -w --plugin-search-dir=. . && echo "stop  Formatting" && echo "start Linting" && eslint --fix --cache --ext js,mjs,md,html,svelte . && echo "stop  Linting"
scripts.tool:lint:check: npm run tool:uninstall:eslint  && npm run tool:rm:node_modules && npm run tool:lint
scripts.update:build: npm run update && npm prune && npm install && npm run build
